22 Jun 2014

代码测试

CCPoint tileCoordForPosition(CCPoint position)
{ 
	int x = position.x / this->getTileSize().width; 
	int y = (((this->getMapSize().height) * this->getTileSize().height) - position.y) / this->getTileSize().height; 
	return ccp(x, y); 
}

代码段

Fenced code blocks are like Stardard Markdown’s regular code blocks, except that they’re not indented and instead rely on a start and end fence lines to delimit the code block.
